title: Conduit Load Irregularity
summary: Power distribution telemetry indicates uneven load balancing across parallel conduit paths.
compliance: Record inspection results in the official maintenance log.

title: Drone Inventory Desync
summary: Automated inventory counts differ from physical docking confirmations by one unit.
compliance: Reconcile inventory and return all assets to registered slots.

title: Cryostasis Sensor Drift
summary: Cryostasis temperature sensors report gradual calibration drift within acceptable variance.
compliance: Confirm calibration and submit results to system logs.

title: Ore Classification Mismatch
summary: Material analysis outputs do not align with current classification tables for known resources.
compliance: Route analysis results through approved corporate channels.

title: Cargo Mass Offset
summary: Mass sensors indicate minor distribution imbalance relative to recorded stowage profiles.
compliance: Maintain container configuration unless authorized otherwise.

title: Coolant Phase Variance
summary: Coolant telemetry registers intermittent phase changes during standard operating cycles.
compliance: Account for coolant variance against efficiency metrics.

title: Crew Roster Index Error
summary: Personnel management software flags inconsistent indexing within active crew schedules.
compliance: Update roster records and confirm index integrity.

title: Internal Signal Routing Conflict
summary: Signal routing logs show redundant internal paths selected during routine transmission.
compliance: Flag routing conflict and preserve transmission records.

title: Maintenance Timestamp Desynchronization
summary: Subsystem maintenance logs report non-sequential timestamp entries across recent cycles.
compliance: Resynchronize clocks and document correction.

title: Thermal Insulation Degradation
summary: Thermal sensors indicate uneven heat retention consistent with aging insulation panels.
compliance: Document degradation and maintain current habitation parameters.

title: Medical Database Fragmentation
summary: Medical records storage reports fragmented archival blocks during routine integrity checks.
compliance: Initiate database consolidation and verify checksum integrity.

title: Extractor Control Input Latency
summary: Control interface registers delayed acknowledgment between command input and system response.
compliance: Confirm control responsiveness and clear input buffers.

title: Atmospheric Sensor Redundancy Conflict
summary: Primary and secondary atmospheric sensors report conflicting readings within tolerance margins.
compliance: Designate authoritative sensor set and document override.

title: Airlock Seal Wear Indicator
summary: Seal integrity monitors report increased material fatigue during routine pressure cycling.
compliance: Log wear indicators and maintain standard access protocols.

title: Reactor Shielding Diagnostic Noise
summary: Radiation sensors detect elevated background noise during shielding self-diagnostics.
compliance: Record diagnostic output and continue monitoring.

title: Navigation Reference Drift
summary: Astrogation reference data shows minor drift relative to stored stellar baseline models.
compliance: Update reference alignment and archive prior data set.

title: Mess Hall Supply Tracker Error
summary: Automated ration tracking reports count discrepancies across multiple supply categories.
compliance: Reconcile supply counts and update inventory records.

title: Residual Biosignature Detection
summary: Passive biosensors register a low-strength biological signature trace inconsistent with any active crew profile.
compliance: Log anomaly and continue routine monitoring.

title: Reactor Output Instability
summary: Reactor power regulators exhibit underdamped oscillation during sustained load, producing cyclic deviation around the nominal setpoint.
compliance: Stabilize output variance and document corrective action in the maintenance log.

title: Life Support Scrubber Certification Lapse
summary: COâ‚‚ scrubber cartridges fail algorithmic lifecycle validation despite acceptable gas exchange performance.
compliance: Re-certify scrubber assemblies and update system logs.

title: Cryo Wing Access Seal Fault
summary: Helium leak-rate testing identifies repeated micro-permeation events during pressure equalization cycles.
compliance: Restore seal integrity and certify compartment pressure stability in system logs.

title: Ore Intake Conveyor Torque Spike
summary: Drive motors record transient torsional stress exceeding modeled friction coefficients for current material composition.
compliance: Inspect drive assemblies and return torque behavior to nominal range.

title: Extractor Alignment Drift
summary: Bore guidance sensors report cumulative angular deviation relative to inertial reference calibration.
compliance: Recalibrate alignment controls and log updated reference values.

title: Cargo Hold Restraint Margin Reduction
summary: Load restraint tension models indicate reduced safety margin under simulated thrust and rotation profiles.
compliance: Re-secure affected cargo and certify restraint margins in the maintenance log.

title: Drone Bay Diagnostic Loop
summary: Autonomous service cradle remains trapped in validation state due to failed convergence of diagnostic checks.
compliance: Clear fault state and restore cradle readiness status.

title: Operations Schedule Conflict
summary: Task allocation software produces non-resolvable overlap between mission-critical duty blocks within a single shift.
compliance: Resolve schedule conflicts and publish the corrected roster to system logs.

title: Communications Buffer Saturation
summary: Packet queues sustain backpressure conditions as internal message throughput exceeds negotiated handling capacity.
compliance: Purge nonessential queues and verify nominal routing throughput.

title: Maintenance Access Power Draw Anomaly
summary: Distributed current sensors measure persistent parasitic load inconsistent with dormant subsystem states.
compliance: Isolate the draw source and record corrective action in the maintenance log.

title: Reactor Cooling Flow Degradation
summary: Primary coolant loop flow rate falls below minimum thermal stability threshold under sustained power output.
compliance: Reduce reactor load and restore coolant circulation to certified operating levels.

title: Life Support Partial Pressure Instability
summary: Cabin atmospheric composition drifts outside modeled partial pressure balance during normal metabolic load.
compliance: Stabilize atmospheric mix and verify life support regulation integrity.

title: Extractor Structural Resonance
summary: Harmonic vibration analysis identifies resonance coupling between bore assembly and ship superstructure.
compliance: Dampen resonance conditions and restore structural stability parameters.

title: Cargo Hold Load Shift
summary: Inertial monitoring detects active mass displacement exceeding restraint compensation limits.
compliance: Secure cargo distribution and confirm structural load compliance.

title: Communications Antenna Misalignment
summary: Antenna pointing solutions diverge from inertial reference frame beyond correction tolerance.
compliance: Realign antenna arrays and reestablish stable communication geometry.

title: Power Bus Isolation Failure
summary: Electrical bus segmentation fails to isolate transient faults during load redistribution.
compliance: Isolate affected power buses and restore fault containment capability.

title: Hull Integrity Breach
summary: Pressure sensors register rapid loss inconsistent with controlled venting or airlock cycling.
advisory: Environmental safety not assured. Vac suits mandatory.
compliance: Isolate breached compartments and restore pressure containment immediately.

title: Reactor Containment Failure
summary: Containment field stability drops below minimum tolerances during active operation.
advisory: Radiation hazard present. Vac suits mandatory. Access restricted.
compliance: Scram reactor and restore containment integrity.

title: Life Support Cascade Failure
summary: Atmospheric regulation systems fail to converge on stable composition across inhabited zones.
advisory: Environmental safety not assured. Vac suits mandatory.
compliance: Stabilize atmosphere or initiate controlled compartment isolation.

title: Primary Power Grid Collapse
summary: Power distribution enters uncontrolled load shedding with repeated system resets.
advisory: System stability compromised. Nonessential access prohibited.
compliance: Restore controlled power distribution or initiate emergency power protocols.

title: Thermal Radiator Failure
summary: Heat rejection capacity drops below minimum thresholds required for sustained operation.
compliance: Restore thermal dissipation capability or initiate emergency shutdown procedures.
